column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Find Bloody GIR
#Text=So you have heard of Bloody GIR , but do n't know how to find him ?
#Text=Here are some ideas .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Go to the Bloody GIR page to read read and understand what the GIR is .
#Text=Find the Invader Zim DVDs that contain episodes known to contain the image of Bloody GIR and play them frame by frame .

#Text=He 's been registered as being in Mortos Der Soulstealer , Bad Bad Rubber Piggies , Plague of Babies , Tak : The Hideous New Girl , Backseat Drivers From Beyond the Stars and The Fry cook What Came from All That Space .
#Text=Nick is showing Invader Zim for this March only .
#Text=To find Bad , Bad Rubber Piggies , watch closely as the final pig goes through the Space Time Object Replacement Device when the portal flashes white .
#Text=You can see a very faint image of Bloody GIR .
#Text=It is easier if you have a laptop , you can tilt the screen , it is very easy now
#Text=To find the Plague of Babies
#Text=Watch the Voot ship crash sequence .
#Text=You will notice several instances of Bloody GIR looking into the window at the left side of the screen .
#Text=To find Tak : The Hideous New Girl , watch as Tak 's ship falls from space .
#Text=As it crashes , Bloody GIR is faintly visible at the center of the screen .
#Text=Or , as the meat ship lands , when the door is about to be completely opened , near the back wheels of the ship , a Bloody GIR is seen .
#Text=Look for the Backseat Drivers from Beyond the Stars .
#Text=Watch as the Almighty Tallest discovers the Resisty 's Vort ship .
#Text=A Bloody GIR appears on Purple 's head as he says , " That 's a Vort Ship . "
#Text=When the Frycook What Came from All That Space , during a flashback of when Zim first started working , a scene is shown when alien customers start spitting their soda at him .
#Text=When this is going on watch the window , a very familiar ship passes by .
#Text=When it gets to the left of Zim 's head you see Bloody GIR on the ship .
#Text=You have to go frame by frame or pause very quickly to see this one .
#Text=After the ship flies by , the customer throws a cup at Zim .
#Text=When two cups are visible in midair , pause right at that second and very very faintly visible over the cups will be Bloody GIR .
#Text=Pause this video at exactly 6:35 .
#Text=At the start of the episode of Game Slave 2 when the flaming piggies fly past the moon a Bloody GIR can be seen near the trail of the top middle one .
#Text=When Dib is attacking the mutant Santa in The Most Horrible X-mas Ever
#Text=Bloody Gir is seen in his mouth under his tongue .
#Text=When the Poop Dog is talking to the students in Door to Door
#Text=the screen turns to students sitting next to Zim .
#Text=Look in the Centre .
#Text=It 's very faint , but it is there .
#Text=Look very Closely .
#Text=In Dark Harvest , when the chase between Zim and Dib starts , you can faintly see one eye of Bloody GIR .
#Text=In the The Sad , Sad Tale of Chickenfoot , as the microwave explodes , in the bottom-right corner , Bloody GIR is spotted .
#Text=The background is red , so it might not be as easy to spot in the background as other ones .
#Text=In The Girl who Cried Gnome , when Zim is in disguise on tv , right when it does n't show his face , but you can hear him , near the roof of the green house near Dib , is a Bloody GIR .
#Text=In Planet Jackers , as Zim is zooming in on Invader skutch , the top-right part of the biggest planet is a Bloody GIR .
#Text=In Walk of Doom , when Zim and Gir get in the taxi , look in the mirror by Zim 's head .
#Text=You will see a Bloody GIR .

#Text=In Mortos Der Soulstealer , during the theme song , right as the pipes snake out of Zim 's house , the big pipe is right in front of the camera , a Bloody GIR is noticeable in the center of the screen for several frames .
#Text=This sighting is easier than some , if you can find the right frames .
#Text=Rise of Zitboy : After the pizza guy pulls up and opens the door , one eye of bloody GIR can be seen on the middle edge of the door crack .
#Text=In The Best of Invader Zim DVD , when they are showing the clip where ZIM is saying to GIR , " Little fellow , you 're so cute ! "
#Text=and GIR says " I am ! "
#Text=EXACTLY after Dib hits Zim with a candy cane , you can see a very faint Bloody GIR .
#Text=Look for the eyes .
#Text=Everything else might be unclear , but the eyes are still bright red .
#Text=Tips
#Text=The one from Mortos Der Soulstealer is the easiest to find .
#Text=Backseat Drivers From Beyond the Stars is the hardest .
#Text=Do the easiest first .
#Text=Bloody gir is only shown in one-four frames at a time .
#Text=so it might be best to have a frame by frame DVD player,T.V. set or using a ps3 for it can also go frame by frame as well .
#Text=In some cases get close to your TV .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do n't do this if you 're easily frightened .
#Text=Seeing a cute character like GIR covered in blood can be a little disturbing .
